sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SANTEN, a town of Germany, in the circle of Weſtphalia, and in the duchy of Cleves. It has a handſome church belonging to the Roman Catholics, wherein is an image of the Virgin Mary, which they pretend performs a great many miracles. Here the fine walks begin that run as far as Weſel, from which it is five miles diſtant to the north-weſt. E. Long. 6. 33. N. Lat. 51. 38.
